website_summaries.verdict: Operated by a hands-free motor, this deluxe pasta maker offers top-notch convenience and quality. The very best.
pros: Made of hearty nickel and chrome-plated steel
Offers a broad range of outputs

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We are enthusiastic weekend cooks, my husband and I, and love to cook "around the world". Italian is one of our favorites, but we never made our own pasta. I finally decided to get this machine, and it has opened up endless possibilities! We already made ravioli, fettuccine, tortellini and all of it with easy and perfectly without the slightest difficulty. I am so glad we chose the machine with motor, because you have both hands free that way and can really run the pasta sheets through all settings with ease! We are thrilled about this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Maren

customer_reviews.title: machine is great but motor sucks.
customer_reviews.text: the machine is great to make noodle, will save a lot of time, and very easy to clean. but I 'd to say the motor's power is really small. I have used about one and a half month. the dough always make the motor stuck and stop spinning and smell like it will burn. after a while, I cannot tolerate and switched to hand roller which works fine. the machine is super great if without the motor. Considering the most part of the price is for the motor itself, I won't recommend people to buy it unless you always make very soft rough.
customer_reviews.author: Yulong

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few gentle uses
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great until it no longer worked. The motor stopped working only two months after I purchased it, after only using it about 6 times. Would love to return it, but the return time on this item is only one month. Very disappointing for an item that costs a solid amount. Maybe this machine works great for some others if it doesn't break, and maybe mine was an anomaly. However if that was the case it would be great to be able to return it for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Five

customer_reviews.title: Typical Italian excellence
customer_reviews.text: Italian specialize in a few things like Goodwine, leather goods, fast cars, and great food and food products. This machine is not fancy it does not have a trillion Programmable dials. Actually it is quite limited - two cans of pasta done including Linguine. We use it quite a lot for ravioli and since I have a ravioli cutter and filler it makes the job quite easy. I clean my device with a high spray hose outside for easier it gets very clean.

customer_reviews.title: Live and learn.

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pasta machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pasta machine. Go the extra mile and get the motor attachment. It is powerful, designed very well and easy to use. I had originally purchased another brand machine. That machine failed within 10 minutes of the first use. The problem was the plastic, probably Delrin, under the rollers that fed/guided the dough to the cutter. I packed it up and sent it back. The Marcato Atlas does not have the design flaw and works perfectly. I would definitely recommend the Marcato Atlas machine.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: At some point I found an issue with my pasta machine as the knob would no longer adjust the thickness of the pasta. After providing proof of purchase and confirming my address, a replacement roller was mailed to me via UPS Ground. These are the customer service experiences I like to highlight and recognize. The process was simple and there were no hoops to jump through, leaving me happy and with a replacement part to keep using this great product. Kudos to Marcato and Harold Import!

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Pasta Maker
customer_reviews.text: The Atlas pasta machine is wonderful. Extremely easy to set up and use. The instructions are in multiple languages and very easy to understand. Having the motor makes it a bit easier to use, but with the hand crank (which is included) is almost as easy. After making and eating my own pasta I will never buy from the store again.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I only can say it's a garbage. I used it no more than 10 times, it stopped to work. Most of it made by plastic except some coils must made by metal. I'll never buy Atlas' machines..
customer_reviews.author: Fei Yue

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, fast to set up and a breeze to clean. Highly recommended. Surprised it didn't say that a combination fettuccine and spaghetti attachment was enclosed. Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Husband & Wife

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and it works great. It was a Christmas gift and I would highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kusch

customer_reviews.title: They love it! Works well
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a xmas gift for my parents. They love it! Works well. Just a little noisy, but you get used to it.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing to not be using a hand crank any more
customer_reviews.text: Wish the thickest setting was a little thicker. Amazing to not be using a hand crank any more!
